CompleteCertificateRefs

public CompleteCertificateRefs()
Creates new CompleteCertificateRefs and initializes everything to null

CompleteCertificateRefs

public CompleteCertificateRefs(java.lang.String certId,
                               java.lang.String digAlg,
                               byte[] digest,
                               java.math.BigInteger serial)
                        throws DigiDocException
Creates new CompleteCertificateRefs. Rerouted to set those values on responders certid.

Parameters:
certId - OCSP responders cert id (in XML)
digAlg - OCSP responders certs digest algorithm id/uri
digest - OCSP responders certs digest
serial - OCSP responders certs issuers serial number
Throws:
DigiDocException - for validation errors

CompleteCertificateRefs

public CompleteCertificateRefs(Signature sig,
                               java.security.cert.X509Certificate respCert)
                        throws DigiDocException
Creates new CompleteCertificateRefs by using default values for id and responders cert Rerouted to set those values on responders certid.

Parameters:
sig - Signature object
respCert - OCSP responders cert
Throws:
DigiDocException - for validation errors
